name: Hard Gun
description:
The fate of the game depends on the players

A mixture of challenging platforming, shooter and destruction. You need to deliver the tank to the end of the level in order to move to the next one. To do this, you can sit behind a tank and destroy all buildings, furniture and other things that get in your way. But not always all obstacles can be passed while sitting in the tank. To do this, you need to solve problems with only one machine gun in your hand
